questions:
1. What is the purpose of the CategoryEntryPage import? - The CategoryEntryPage import is used to define the props that the Page404 component expects to receive. 2. Why is the Page404 component a functional component? - The Page404 component is a functional component because it does not need to maintain any state or use lifecycle methods. 3. What does the
404
JSX code represent? - The
404
JSX code represents the content that will be displayed on the page when the user encounters a 404 error.
